sentences.sContent: This was a 21st century bank heist that reached through the Internet to span the globe.
sentences.sContent_eng: This was a 21st century bank heist that reached through the Internet to span the globe.
sentences.sCn: 这是一种21世纪通过互联网遍布全球的银行抢劫。

sentences.sContent: As each minute of the heist ticks by, true motives are revealed and unexpected twists ratchet up the stakes to a thrilling crescendo.
sentences.sContent_eng: As each minute of the heist ticks by, true motives are revealed and unexpected twists ratchet up the stakes to a thrilling crescendo.
sentences.sCn: 作为抢劫的每分钟运转的，真正的动机是揭示和意想不到的曲折加大赌注一个激动人心的高潮。

sentences.sContent: After a botched heist, Eddie (Bruce Willis), a murderous crime boss, hunts down the seductive thief Karen (Claire Forlani) who failed him.
sentences.sContent_eng: After a botched heist, Eddie (Bruce Willis), a murderous crime boss, hunts down the seductive thief Karen (Claire Forlani) who failed him.
sentences.sCn: 一个拙劣的抢劫后，埃迪（布鲁斯·威利斯），一个凶残的黑帮老大，查获诱人的小偷卡伦（克莱尔·弗兰妮）谁辜负了他。

remMethod.val: 电影《偷天盗影》的英文是Heist

trans.tranOther: A heist is a robbery, especially one in which money, jewellery, or art is stolen
